prompt:

    Alistair Finch's academic journey has been deeply rooted in the University of Cambridge. response:
```
Alistair Finch has built his entire academic career at the University of Cambridge. After earning his PhD in Computer Science from the institution in 2012, he moved directly into a faculty role at his alma mater. Now 36 years old, Dr. Finch is an Associate Professor in the Computer Science department, with 11 years of experience in both research and teaching at Cambridge. As a British national, his higher education and professional pursuits have all taken place within this renowned UK university. His work centers on advancing the field of artificial intelligence, teaching advanced computer science topics, and mentoring students in their research. Outside of academia, Dr. Finch enjoys playing chess, reading widely, and cycling through the picturesque surroundings of Cambridge. His career reflects a strong commitment to his discipline and to the university community.
```
